story1.name: story1
story1.story:
Once upon a time, there was a Caterpillar Family.
They lived on a oak tree in the Amazon rainforest...

story2.name: story2
story2.story:
One day, a hungry American Robin bird attacked
this Caterpillar family.Only one baby Caterpillar
named Hermie could escape from the attack.

story3.name: story3
story3.story:
Little Caterpillar Hermie planned to get revenge
from the Robin bird that attacked his family.

story4.name: story4
story4.story:
Can you help Little Caterpillar Hermie to get revenge
from his enemy before he turns in to a beautiful Butterfly???
